A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: My friends and I highly enjoyed this installment. We did not expect most of the movies twists and turns. It made us excited for the next movie. While it's sad that Leia won't be in it anymore\, her character was well featured. The experience in the theater was also one to remember. There were many funny and sad moments\, but overall it was fantastic. I don't understand all of the bashing\, it was creative and met my expectations.
